ref: 8544 *pratikāṣṭha ʻ wooden block ʼ. [For the prep. cf. pratikāya -- ʻ target ʼ. -- kāṣṭhá -- ]
Bi. pariyāṭhā ʻ wooden framework over a well on which the drawer stands ʼ, (Gaya) ʻ carpenter's block, anvil block ʼ, (Patna) pareṭhā ʻ anvil block ʼ;
Mth. pariaṭh, paraiṭh, parhaṭā ʻ fodder chopping block ʼ.
